text: P.K. and the Kid (also known as Petaluma Pride) is a 1987 American drama film directed by Lou Lombardo and starring Paul Le Mat, Molly Ringwald and Alex Rocco. Filmed in 1983 but shelved four years, it was eventually released in 1987.VV.AA. Variety Film Reviews, Volume 20.
